numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Legacy applicants have a higher chance of admission to the college.
2. Richer students are 7 times as likely to be admitted as poorer students.
3. A non-legacy rich student has the same chance of admission as a legacy rich student.
4. I wonder why legacy students have a better chance of admission.
5. I wonder why richer students have a better chance of admission if the students can get financial aid.
6. I wonder what makes the difference between a legacy student and a non-legacy student.
8. Great Neck is in my community.
9. Great Neck has a richer population.
10. In Great Neck, some students get admitted to great schools.
11. Some of these schools are Ivy League schools.
12. I have seen some low-income students who go to better schools.
13. However, I have mainly seen low-income students who go to worse schools.
14. The headline is: Richer get richer.
